hops.message: Symbol defined as route in admin.py but actual function name differs

Admin router properly mounted with prefix '/v1/admin'
PerformanceMetric model exists and properly defined
No admin API service implementation found
Admin UI exists but uses mock data, no API integration

defects.msg: Symbol name 'admin_get_performance_metrics_GET' doesn't match actual function name 'get_performance_metrics'
Missing admin API service - no frontend integration for performance metrics endpoint
Admin console uses mock performance alerts instead of real API data
Route path '/system/performance' inconsistent with admin router prefix - should be accessible via '/v1/admin/system/performance'
No unit tests found for get_performance_metrics function
